items.question: What should financial advisors wear?
items.answer: Professional business attire works best - suits, blazers, or formal business wear. Dark colors convey trust and competence.

items.question: Are these appropriate for compliance-reviewed materials?
items.answer: Yes. Our professional headshots meet the quality standards expected in regulated industries and can be used in all client-facing materials.

items.question: How do we handle teams across multiple offices?
items.answer: Each team member receives an invite link and can submit their selfie from any location. No coordination required.

items.question: Can we use these in annual reports?
items.answer: Yes. Our photos are high-resolution and suitable for print materials including annual reports and marketing collateral.

items.question: Do you offer enterprise pricing?
items.answer: Yes. We offer volume discounts for firms with 25+ team members. Contact us for custom pricing.
